NixOS-DotfilesA modular NixOS configuration framework

Build reproducible NixOS systems with flake-parts, import-tree, and composable modules.

Get Started
View on GitHub

Modular Architecture

Every piece of configuration is a standalone module — nixosModules for system-level config and homeManagerModules for user-level config. Mix and match per host.

Zero Boilerplate

Powered by flake-parts and import-tree. Drop a .nix file anywhere under modules/ and it is automatically discovered and registered as a flake output.

TUI Installer

A Rust-based terminal installer walks you through disk partitioning, module selection, and user creation — then runs nixos-install with your flake.
